Object Parameters: Time of one period on the Z-axis in 1/60 seconds
Amplitude of the cosine on the Z-axis
Offset starting Z position within the specified movement in 1/60 seconds
Time of one period on the Y-axis in 1/60 seconds

Description: Floating drivable rock (at Grumble Volcano in the lava). It moves like a cosine on the Z-axis and the Y-axis.
